channel.title: How do you make passwords not encrypted? -Unresolved-
channel.description: Yes, I am wondering how you get your passwords to not be encrypted. I'm not talking about the ::getpass command where you can see their password. I'm talking about where you can always see their password. I use to know how to do it and now I don't. Please help me out :)

item.title: How do you make passwords not encrypted? -Unresolved-

why would you want to do this?
